reviewText: This movie is excellent with a lot of suspense, a very unusual killer in love with the smell of the human body. It is based on a novel that has been read in many countries. Readers are not fully satisfied with the movie, but if you did not read the book, I am sure that you will be fully satisfied with the movie. If you happen to like perfumes, you will have lot of fun with this movie.

Fascinating behine the scenes look at the world of fragrance. Sadly, there are just 3 episdoes.
Will more episdoes be added?
